discussion_comments.comment_body:
Would it be better to sort this list alphabetically?

Also, would it be better to write out the long form as seen in docs here? Since some is quite long.

Yeah maybe it's better to sort it (I kind of used the order of the languages for the language servers) and use the long-form (at least something to the level `[language-server.<name>]`). Anyone else agreeing here or has some suggestions?

```suggestion
"markup.link.url"             = { fg = "markup_link_url_fg", modifiers = ["underlined"] }
```

small typo here: when used in `modifiers` it should be `underlined` instead of `underline`

discussion_comments.comment_body:
The _rename back_ is possible.

Having '`deb`' in the filename will block re-use with `cargo rpm`.

Proposal:
```
  { source = "../contrib/helix-wrapper.sh", dest = "/usr/bin/hx", mode = "755" },
```
